author: rgardler
msg: Skeleton for outputting OOo writer files - down't quite work yet, the files are generated, but they can't be opened by Open Office. Probably a problem with the structure of the generated files

author: rich
msg: Minor code cleanup related to the XDoclet-compiler checkin from last night.  Also, fixed an issue where a form bean that both extended FormData and implemented Validatable was not having its Validatable.validate() method called.

author: rgardler
msg: A plugin that will draw charts using jCharts. This has been donated to the jCharts proejct, and has been accepted, but is not currently available in their CVS so I've put it here in case anyone wants it. See README.txt for URL of the patch at jCharts.
